reviewText:
Cinema way back then was shot in black and white, and the subject matter has not changed one iota.
It is funny how time has not altered the desire to make love or enjoy the body parts of the human being. No one can invent anything new about the lust for the opposite sex in the heat of the moment.
bad filming and wore out copy was of no value to me and sorry I bought it.  pass on it
If you are looking for true twenties porno, I'd suggest passing on this. Period costumes, b&w/ grainy editing, modern actors, and that's about as far as it gets to vintage.
